name: Party Drinker Simulator
description:
In Party Drinker Simulator all you have to do is drink and party. Enjoy the music the DJ prepared for you and ponder about what the other people in the club are thinking about.

If you are feeling adventurous you can also look for secrets. They are hidden everywhere within the scene and they can consist of more drinks or even short lines and thoughts that will make you think for a bit. Be sure to jump and pee everywhere, as a normal drunk person would do.

The point of this game is to create an enjoyable experience where you don't necessarily have goals, but can act and interpret the situation in your own ways.

The Pro version features a new small room to thank supporters of the game.

WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS AND SCREEN EFFECTS NOW CAN BE TURNED OFF IN THE OPTIONS MENU
